summary: This module defines a Chainlit application that integrates LlamaIndex callback mechanisms. It sets up event handling for LlamaIndex operations, processes chat messages and responses, and renders interactive UI components for end‑to‑end testing with Cypress. A lightweight helper is included to initialize the demo flow.
business_intent: Provide a demonstrable integration point for developers to test and showcase how LlamaIndex callbacks can be wired into a Chainlit chat interface, facilitating rapid prototyping and validation of callback‑driven workflows.
